24 //The 'label' scene should be pre-initialized as follows:
25 // label->data[p]=NIL, unlabeled voxel.
26 // label->data[p]=0, background voxel.
27 // label->data[p]=1, object#1 voxel.
28 // label->data[p]=2, object#2 voxel.
29 // ...
